title: Worktrees
description: Manage git worktrees for parallel task execution
selectProject: Select a project to view worktrees
emptyDescription: Git worktrees allow you to work on multiple branches simultaneously. Create worktrees for your tasks to enable parallel development.
mergeDescription: Merge this worktree back into its base branch
deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this worktree?
cannotUndo: This action cannot be undone. The worktree directory and all uncommitted changes will be permanently deleted.
